LanguageData.HordeScenario.label: Horde - Breakout
LanguageData.HordeScenario.description: Humans managed to sedate and capture the three of you after you attacked in blind, bloodlust-driven rage. After setting up and holding you in a new internment camp you managed to escape and flee your captors, but must now find safety with only the few supplies you managed to steal.

LanguageData.HordeScenario.scenario.summary: A group of orcs escape an internment camp and explore foreign lands.
